post.body: wow thanks, Steve. That's great feedback, I also like how it looks on the tshirt I mocked up, flows well verbally too!
woah so its really broken? I'm sorry to hear that. Btw your card should reach you today crossing my fingers!
thanks I'd love to: its living at http://www.unemployedblog.com should launch 12/25 officially, working a couple kinks out now
Thanks, I'll take a look. I looked into CafePress but their quality was pretty bad. unemployedblog.com will launch soon :P
The words "Commit" and "Vista" in the same sentence are a bit quixotic.
http://twitpic.com/v9v9 - Tarantino?
Spam Zombies, nothing more
That which doesn't kill you.... blah blah blah sure... Sign me up 2
look at it this way, the goblins will get more holiday fun from the devil. Btw that DVD went back in the mail mein herr!
I mis-read that. Thought you were working at Starbucks as in an employee. Was going to say, I never see you there lol
Wait... which one? It's not cold in Houston??? (Shrug)
I'm hoping to see 7lbs tonight, schedule permitting. Glad to hear you liked it, critics killed it but "whatever".
I had no idea you worked for Crocs. I'll have to shoot you some questions offline.
Generous/gracious you know what I mean :)
Looking for a gracious web designer to help with our wordpress template. Credit given and good traffic flow guaranteed once site launches!
Trying to decide on the best of two domain names: www.unemployedtoday.com or www.unemployedblog.com both are catchy, memorable, SEO friendly
Installing WP 2.7 for www.unemployedblog.com
Opened the apartment door hard, it bounced on a stopper, hit me in the temple knocked me out cold for 1m. Metallic taste in mouth, not good.
Just got off the phone with a clinic looking for a Massage Therapist. To bad I'm not licensed. I could wear Crocs and Scrubs... (sigh...)
Job hunting, watching way too much History Channel, and discussion the merits of h3 alternative energy with my step-father.
